definition: "speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
"speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]

sentences.english: It's easy to love with just words and tongue.
sentences.chinese: 只用讠语和舌头来爱是轻而易举的。

sentences.english: All children have natural talent for language learning.
sentences.chinese: 谈到学习语讠，小朋友向来有天赋。

sentences.english: You learn to move your mouth in new ways.
sentences.chinese: 当你学习一个新的语讠时。

sentences.english: Indeed. Language is a wonderful tool.
sentences.chinese: 语讠是个非常好用的工具。

definition: "knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
to walk (side part of split character)
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
name of "speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 訁|讠[yan2]
step with the left foot (Kangxi radical 60)/see also 彳亍[chi4 chu4]

old variant of 某[mou3]

"ice" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 15), occurring in 冰[bing1], 次[ci4] etc, known as 兩點水|两点水[liang3 dian3 shui3]
variant of 集[ji2]
"silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]

the left-radical form of Kangxi radical 145, 衣[yi1]
variant of 假[jia3]/to borrow
fake/false/artificial/to borrow/if/suppose

"cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]
